pageProduct.name: A'kin Rosehip Oil with Vitamin C 20ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Brightening Vitamin C & Rosehip Facial Oil with Australian Macadamia Oil and Certified Organic Rosehip Oil.

A lightweight and fast absorbing potent facial oil to reduce visible signs of ageing, appearance of sun damage, pigmentation and age spots. Our Certified Organic Rosehip Oil is extracted by pressurised CO2 making it a highly active ingredient, delivering a pure and concentrated oil. Enriched with Vitamin C to brighten and even skin tone, Rosemary Leaf Extract and Australian Macadamia Oil to nourish the skin, including dry lips for a vibrant and luminous complexion.
 
80% of users agree their skin looks more radiant?
76% of users agree their skin looks brighter?
93% of users agree their skin is nourished?
76^ of users agree their skin looks dewy & fresh? 

?Results based on an independent laboratory self-assessment study.

Warnings

We recommend patch testing before use. For external use only.

Ingredients

Rosa Canina Seed Extract+~ (Rosehip), Macadamia, Integrifolia Seed Oil*?, Ascorbyl Tetraisopalmitate (Vitamin C), Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract+~.

+Certified Organic, *from Botanical source, ~CO2 extraction, ?Cold Pressed

Directions

After cleansing apply 3-4 drops and gently massage into face, neck and décolletage prior to moisturiser. Use twice daily focusing on areas of pigmentation and sun damage.

USAGE ADVICE

Apply to décolletage and backs of hands at night to help reduce and prevent skin discolouration.
